U

update(Tour, Tour) - Method in class com.what2see.service.tour.TourService
Updates an existing Tour entity.
The tour to be updated must have an id.
The following fields modifications are ignored and not updated: id author creationDate reviews reports
User - Class in com.what2see.model.user
Entity that represents a user in the database.
All subclasses are mapped to the same table but managed by different repositories.
User() - Constructor for class com.what2see.model.user.User
 
UserController - Class in com.what2see.controller.user
Controller for user endpoints
UserController() - Constructor for class com.what2see.controller.user.UserController
 
UserDTOMapper - Class in com.what2see.mapper.user
Service that converts User entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
UserDTOMapper() - Constructor for class com.what2see.mapper.user.UserDTOMapper
 
UserLoginDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.user
Implementation of DTO pattern for logging in users in the incoming body.
Note that the UserLoginDTO.username field is trimmed and case-insensitive.
UserLoginDTO() - Constructor for class com.what2see.dto.user.UserLoginDTO
 
userMapper - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController

username - Variable in class com.what2see.dto.user.UserResponseDTO
 
username - Variable in class com.what2see.model.user.User
 
UserRegisterDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.user
Implementation of DTO pattern for registering users in the incoming body.
Note that the UserRegisterDTO.username field is trimmed and case-insensitive while UserRegisterDTO.firstName and UserRegisterDTO.lastName fields are trimmed only.
UserRegisterDTO() - Constructor for class com.what2see.dto.user.UserRegisterDTO
 
userRepository - Variable in class com.what2see.service.user.UserServiceImpl
 
UserRepository<T extends User> - Interface in com.what2see.repository.user
Repository that provides CRUD operations for User entities.
This repository is used for typing purposes only and can't be injected directly.
UserRepositoryImpl - Interface in com.what2see.repository.user
Repository that provides CRUD operations for User entities.
Only overrides interface method for typing purposes.
Should be injected as UserRepository<User> for type safety.
UserResponseDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.user
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning users in the incoming body.
Note that the UserResponseDTO.role field is mapped based on the actual User subclass.
UserResponseDTO() - Constructor for class com.what2see.dto.user.UserResponseDTO
 
UserRole - Enum Class in com.what2see.dto.user
Utility enum for communicating user roles with the client.
Note that the ordinal of each value must match the client side.
UserRole() - Constructor for enum class com.what2see.dto.user.UserRole
 
UserRoleMapper - Class in com.what2see.mapper.user
Utility class that maps User entities to UserRole enums based on their subclass.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side and let it be more flexible.
UserRoleMapper() - Constructor for class com.what2see.mapper.user.UserRoleMapper
 
userService - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.tour.CityController
 
userService - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TagController
 
userService - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.tour.ThemeController
 
userService - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.tour.TourController
 
userService - Variable in class com.what2see.controller.user.UserController
 
userService - Variable in class com.what2see.service.tour.TourService
 
UserService<T extends User> - Class in com.what2see.service.user
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the common business logic for all User subclasses, independently of their concrete type.
UserService() - Constructor for class com.what2see.service.user.UserService
 
UserServiceImpl - Class in com.what2see.service.user
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the business logic for abstract User entities, independently of their concrete type.
Its only use it to provide the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface to the UserService superclass, which contains the generic business logic for all User entities.
Should be injected as UserService<User> for type safety.
UserServiceImpl() - Constructor for class com.what2see.service.user.UserServiceImpl
